messages.text:
On Fri, Jan 18, 2013 at 1:28 PM, <dcloues@gmail.com> wrote:

> On 2013/01/18 21:07:49, rsc wrote:
>
>> Seems okay. Anyone else have an opinion?
>> Please make the CL description
>>
>
>  cmd/go: add hg ssh support
>>
>
> Thanks. The description's been updated.
>

You'll need to submit a CLA before we can submit it, though.

See http://golang.org/doc/contribute.html#copyright

Let us know when that's done and we'll add you to CONTRIBUTORS + AUTHORS.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

Seems okay. Anyone else have an opinion?
Please make the CL description

cmd/go: add hg ssh support

On 2013/01/18 21:07:49, rsc wrote:
> Seems okay. Anyone else have an opinion?
> Please make the CL description
> 
> cmd/go: add hg ssh support

Thanks. The description's been updated.

LGTM

On Fri, Jan 18, 2013 at 1:07 PM, <rsc@golang.org> wrote:

> Seems okay. Anyone else have an opinion?
> Please make the CL description
>
> cmd/go: add hg ssh support
>
>
>
> https://codereview.appspot.**com/7133048/<https://codereview.appspot.com/7133048/>
>

On 2013/01/19 16:44:47, bradfitz wrote:
> You'll need to submit a CLA before we can submit it, though.
> 
> See http://golang.org/doc/contribute.html#copyright
> 
> Let us know when that's done and we'll add you to CONTRIBUTORS + AUTHORS.

Sorry about that - I missed that part of the guide. I submitted the CLA a few minutes ago.

-- Dustin

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=89206a1d39bf ***

cmd/go: add hg ssh support
